mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user(id, username, password, email, register_time, update_time, last_login_time, user_type, age, sex, expiration_date, head_img, phone_number) VALUES (NULL, #{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{registerTime}, #{updateTime}, #{lastLoginTime}, #{userType}, #{age}, #{sex}, #{expirationDate}, #{headImg}, #{phoneNumber})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_user SET password = #{param2} WHERE email = #{param1}
UPDATE t_user SET last_login_time = #{param1} WHERE username = #{param2}
UPDATE t_user SET head_img = #{param2} WHERE id = #{param1}
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM t_user WHERE username = #{param}
SELECT * FROM t_user WHERE username = #{param1} AND password = #{param2}
